text:
Ep 28 of #Cannabis Voices,  I speak to John Malanca who started @upatientsgroup with wife Corinne. In 2017, Corinne lost her battle to #pancreaticcancer & in this ep John shares his struggle dealing with his loss. #cancer #medicalcannabis
Full interview https://t.co/sZCfwA1dcS https://t.co/ow4Wz3LF1B
